```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = TRUE, autodep = TRUE, fig.align = "center")
```

In this study, a dataset of various cars will be explored and analysis will be made on fuel consumption on highways and city driving modes (using Miles per Gallon metrics, $MPG$) of different cars' manufacturers, models, engine size, transmission type.





library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
library(tinytex)
library(ggplot)
library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)
library(scales)

```{r}

# read the data 
Cars <- read_csv ("Cars.csv")
#str(Cars)
```




**Analysis on Cars MPG of different manufacturers:**


```{r}

qplot(manufacturer, data=Cars, geom="bar", fill=manufacturer)

```



**Analysis on number of cylinders among the cars**


```{r}
table(Cars$cyl)
qplot(cyl, data=Cars, geom="bar", fill=factor(cyl))

```
